topic.body:
Why Sean Spicer didnt succeded with his lies ?
https://nytimes.com/2017/04/11/us/politics/sean-spicer-hitler-gas-holocaust-center.html?_r=0&referer=
1. He is not a Jew and he doesnt have the right properties, training and experience for such a grand scale lie.
2. He didnt got the permission from the Jews to use the word Holocaust.
Holocaust, nazi, fascist are under Jewish license and may be used only with Jewish permission otherwise the hate of the Jewish media is garanteed.
Erdogan was in Israel before and got the Jewish permission to use the word nazi against his opponents and he did it with success but probably he sold his soul to the Jews for that.
topic.title: Sean Spicer Draws Backlash by Comparing Hitler With Assad
